full_sentence: I saw Greg with this really fit bird in the pub last night, but when I went over she was a bloody pakistani. Obviously he was disappointed, we need to do something to make these women think twice about invading our locals
I'm queer, gay, a pillow biter, what ever you want to call me I don't care, at least I'm not living in a council house, i'm living my life MY WAY.

topics.sentence_slice: I'm living my life MY WAY.

full_sentence: I KNEW back then, that if they let the kids in, it would turn into a play area, and that is exactly what happened.
